title: Quorn chilli
description: Use Quorn mince to make this easy vegetarian chilli recipe.
ingredients: 1 red and 1 yellow pepper, deseeded and chopped
350g jar tomato and chilli pasta sauce
Soured cream or guacamole, to serve (optional)

method.Step 1: Heat the olive oil in a large, non-stick frying pan over a high heat. Add the peppers and cook for 5 minutes, stirring, until softened and charred. Reduce the heat slightly, add the garlic, cumin seeds and Quorn mince. Fry for 3 minutes, then pour the jar of tomato and chilli pasta sauce. Add 150ml water to the jar, rinse out into the pan and stir in the kidney beans.

method.Step 2: Bring to the boil, then simmer for 10-15 minutes or until thick and rich. Stir in the coriander and season to taste.

method.Step 3: Divide between plates and serve with cooked rice. Top with a dollop each of soured cream and fresh, ready-made guacamole, if you like.
